mapper.select: SELECT 'OO총괄' AS COL1 , 'OO지역' AS COL2 , #{perfYm} AS COL3 , #{ogtp} AS COL4 , '1234' AS COL5 , '2345' AS COL6 , '3456' AS COL7 , '4567' AS COL8 , '5678' AS COL9 , '6789' AS COL10 , '7890' AS COL11 , '1234' AS COL12 , '1-일시불' AS COL13 , '1-정상가' AS COL14 , '3-3년' AS COL15 , '82' AS COL16 , 'A-전체' AS COL17 , '123,456' AS COL18 , '36' AS COL19 , '12,345' AS COL20 , '0' AS COL21 , '-' AS COL22 , '-' AS COL23 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'OO총괄' AS COL1 , 'OO지역' AS COL2 , '김웰스 지점' AS COL3 , '123456' AS COL4 , '김교원' AS COL5 , '렌탈' AS COL6 , '환경가전' AS COL7 , '-' AS COL8 , '2022-1234567-12' AS COL9 , '개인' AS COL10 , '2구 포터블 인덕션' AS COL11 , '1234' AS COL12 , '1-일시불' AS COL13 , '1-정상가' AS COL14 , '3-3년' AS COL15 , '82' AS COL16 , 'A-전체' AS COL17 , '123,456' AS COL18 , '36' AS COL19 , '12,345' AS COL20 , '0' AS COL21 , '-' AS COL22 , '-' AS COL23 FROM DUAL
